content:
Related to the Search Page template broken, the Duck-Duck-Go search isn't working.

Repro:

  • open Current Build of IG that uses the searchpage template (QM, SDC, CRD, DEQM)
  • search for something that should be present, like "measure" in the QM IG

Result:

No results found for measure site:https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/cqf-measures/.

Suggestions:

Make sure all words are spelled correctly.
Try different keywords.
Try more general keywords.
Try fewer keywords.

I haven't created a tracker for this yet. Is this a known issue or should I create one?
I've seen the same issue. @Mark Iantorno @Grahame Grieve
hmm. I have a fix but due to the volume of files that are involved, it will take maybe a day to get it done
